name: Kirby's Dream Land 2 DX
summary: Kirby's Dream Land 2 DX is an extensive hack of the original game that offers a fully colorized version of the classic Game Boy platformer. Enjoy the colorful and charming adventure of Kirby and his animal friends as they explore seven worlds and face the evil Dark Matter. This edition features full colorization of the original monochrome graphics, customization options through a new settings menu, and eliminated slow down for a smoother gameplay experience.
